archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: John Kelly Copenhaver graduated from the Virginia Polytechnic Institute with a degree in Electrical Engineering in 1920. Collection includes leather bound commencement invitations and programs from 1919 and 1921, as well as a photograph from the reunion of the class of 1920. Pins and buttons from a VPI cadet uniform are also included.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: John K. Copenhaver Collection, Ms1969-006, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The John Kelly Copenhaver Collection was donated to Special Collections in 1969.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement and description of the John Kelly Copenhaver Collection was completed in July 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: John Kelly Copenhaver was born c.1898 in Seven Mile Ford, Virginia. Copenhaver graduated with a degree in Electrical Engineering from the Virginia Polytechnic Institute in 1920. While attending VPI Copenhaver played on the football team and was injured in a game against Norfolk in November 1919.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of two leather bound commencement invitation and programs, one dating from 1919 and the other from 1921. Also included is a photograph of the reunion of the Class of 1920. Cadet uniform pins and buttons were also donated.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.

did.unittitle: VPI Cadet Uniform pins and buttons
